attributes.action: Allow Direct Recruitment into Police Armed Response Units.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gun and knife crime is on the rise. Both the general public and the police themselves want more Armed Response Units to combat this.

Sir Ian Blair has raised the idea of allowing Direct Recruitment for Armed Response Units; instead of undergoing a two probationary period as a "normal" police officer, suitible candidates will be recuited to carry out Armed Duties ONLY. The Government should put this into practice ASAP.

In the War against terrorism and violent crime, we need to give the police a fighting chance...
